en.content: Winters is happy for you to spend the rest of the afternoon in study and offers you an upright but comfortable chair. You have enough time to pursue one line of research in depth.

zh.content: 文特斯很高兴你能花掉整个下午的时间读书，找了一把直挺但舒适的椅子让你坐。你有足够的时间顺着一条线索做深入的研究。
